snippet: The federal government announced it would spend $40 million to help develop and improve systems to detect and respond to threats of infectious diseases, epidemics and bioterrorism.
abstract: United States government says it will spend $40 million to help low and middle-income countries develop and improve sophisticated systems to detect and respond to threats of infectious diseases, epidemics and bioterrorism.
